name: Kyoro-chan no Purikura Daisakusen
overview: A cute 2d sprites platform game in which the player controls a cartoon parrot in different levels. It is a sequel to the GameBoy game "Pocket Kyoro-Chan", KyoroChan's Purikura Daisakusen was released in 1999 for PlayStation. The main Character, Kyorochan , is a cartoon bird that serves as a mascot for a brand of Morinaga chocolate known as ChocoBall in Japan.
